body:
> As this proposal also solves many of the problems related to move of the x/net/context package, it would be very interesting to discuss this proposal in tandem with the alias proposal (#16339).

`context.Context` and `x/net/context.Context` are defined differently because `context.CancelFunc` type (e.g. returned from WithCancel method) is not the same type as `x/net/context.CancelFunc`. So I am not sure that this proposal as it is can help with move of the x/net/context package.
